name: Mega Man: Another Mayday
summary:
Another Mayday is an experimental gameplay mod for Megaman 8-Bit Deathmatch, a proof-of-concept that provides a new way to play the game. Use the traditional weapons and maps of 8BDM and work together with your allies to defend vital lands against an ever-increasing horde of enemy robots trying to overwhelm you!

Inspired by classic Skulltag Survival Invasion gameplay, Another Mayday takes the gameplay in a significantly more cooperative direction and provides a new way for seasoned veterans to make use of their honed skills.
